en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Indonesia National Baseball Team!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor the Indonesian National Baseball Team with FE's Quantum Pendants at a presentation ceremony at FE's Achiever Recognition Dinner at Hailal International Club on Friday 29th August 2008. Thanking FusionExcel for it's generosity is Luqman Hakim,Coach of the Team who also gave a good Testimonial of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant.
